content: this cute sea turtle is made with 7 pieces head shell/stomach 2 frong legs 2 back legs and one tail you can add a little bow on the head it is destined to a child but it is so cute your may want to keep it on your shelve the pattern is very easy to follow with step-by-step pictures you can try it as your first crochet work if you are used to crochet amigurumis you can download the shorter pattern without pictures **hook** this pattern can be worked with any hook you want refer to your yarn s hook size recommendations and go one size smaller it will give structure to your octopus **yarn** this pattern has been tested with worsted bulky and aran yarn 10-12 ply keep in mind the yarn you choose should be slightly bigger than your crochet size you will need 3 yarn colors * head legs and tail color about 100-170m / 109-186 yards of yarn * shell color about 80-100m / 87-109 yards of yarn * stomach color 50-70m / 55-77 yards of yarn in addition you will need a bit of black yarn for the eyes and mouth **other material** fiberfill stuffing 1 or 2 rattles optional **techniques and stitches** everything is explain in the pattern preambule chain magic_ring sl single_crochet double_crochet increase inv decrease have fun
